getDescription().Description: The description of a predicted place. Examples: Tacoma, Washington Taco Bell, Willitis, CA

Returns: a list of matched substrings in a query suggestion's description.
getMatchedSubstrings().Description: Get a list of matched substrings in a query suggestion's description. Each @B_com#google#android#gms#location#places#AutocompletePrediction#Substring_E@ contains an offset value and a length. These describe the location of the entered term in the prediction result text, so that the term can be highlighted if desired.
getMatchedSubstrings().FullName: public abstract List<? extends AutocompletePrediction.Substring> getMatchedSubstrings ()

getPlaceId().Description: Returns the place ID of the place being referred to by this prediction, or null if this prediction is not for a place.

getPlaceTypes().Description: Returns the list of place types associated with the place referred to by @B_com#google#android#gms#location#places#AutocompletePrediction#getPlaceId_E@.

ClassDesc: Represents a query's suggestions and its attributes, like matched substrings.
